div.p: jurisdiction: United States of America (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed, ICU, licensed, and overflow(surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numTotBeds' = 'numTotBeds)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Inpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow(surge) beds used for inpatients. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numbeds' = 'numbeds)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are occupied. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numBedsOcc' = 'numBedsOcc)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numICUBeds' = 'numICUBeds)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numICUBedsOcc' = 'numICUBedsOcc)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of ventilators available. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numVent' = 'numVent)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Total number of ventilators in use. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numVentUse' = 'numVentUse)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19HospPats' = 'numC19HospPats)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 and are on a mechanical ventilator. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19MechVentPats' = 'numC19MechVentPats)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 14 or more days after hospitalization. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19HOPats' = 'numC19HOPats)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19OverflowPats' = 'numC19OverflowPats)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19OFMechVentPats' = 'numC19OFMechVentPats)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

blockquote.p: code: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location. (Details : {http://build.fhir.org/ig/AudaciousInquiry/saner-ig code 'numC19Died' = 'numC19Died)

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

label.value: COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Module

display.value: The Module enables hospitals to report daily counts of patients with suspected and confirmed COVID-19 diagnoses and current use and availability of hospital beds and mechanical ventilators.

citation.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN)

label.value: Importing COVID-19 Patient Module Denominator data for Patient Safety Component
